thread.title: Grant Hackett missing, family issues public plea for help in tracking him down - ABC News (Australian Broadcasting Corporation)
thread.title_full: Grant Hackett missing, family issues public plea for help in tracking him down - ABC News (Australian Broadcasting Corporation)

author: Kerrin Binnie
title: Grant Hackett missing, family issues public plea for help in tracking him down - ABC News (Australian Broadcasting Corporation)
text:
Map: Southport 4215 
Grant Hackett's family has pleaded with him to make contact with them after revealing the champion swimmer has not been seen since this morning. 
"Grant â€” let us know where you are, we love you, and we want to help you," his father Nev Hackett said. 
Mr Hackett said the Olympian was last seen leaving a Gold Coast hotel he checked into last night, but that he had left by early this morning. 
"If anyone's seen him, to contact the media or the police or the Hackett family, probably to contact Broadbeach police would be the best thing," he said. 
"We need to get him some help immediately." If you or anyone you know needs help: Lifeline on 13 11 14
